review: I love this thing!! Making my Smart TV even that much better. I bought it for sling tv but with apps like Vevo and accessing Netflix through it... even better
author: Travis Butcher

review: We love our Firestick. But not enough movies and shows to watch. You need a better selection.
author: celia jackson

review: Love it. Met all my expectations.
author: Ivan C D Merl

review: I absolutely love this firestick! It came already registered in my name for me I plugged it right in and it started right up! Quick and simple and works great!
author: Dana Peterson

review: Love it.  Seeing so much that I missed.  So much to choose from and both audio and video are good!
author: Priscilla Dean
